slide.title: Lab Goals
slide.p: The purpose of this lab is to help you practice working with simple authentication.
Your lab will be completed in a github repository. This will be your (forked) starter-auth repo.
You may work on your own or in a pair for this lab. Remember to join a group for your dropbox submission, with a link to your repo.
Please make sure that your work is in the "master" branch or your repository, and that any other branches have been merged into it.
Due: Five days after your lab, 17:30pm
